ygData.subject: Re: The deal
ygData.msgSnippet: As soon as Darkfate agreed to the deal Hellpeons body stopped glowing blue. The beast roared once again in its demonic tone before its body shifted into a Bat

As soon as Darkfate agreed to the deal Hellpeons body stopped glowing 
blue. The beast roared once again in its demonic tone before its body 
shifted into a Bat and scorpion fusion made of energy. Quickly he 
flew down and slammed into the crater he created before and burrowed 
directly into the ground heading to go under the shields of the 
trianers base.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> He got DarkFate's message and prepared to run and shoot when the 
field
> dropped.
